title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Document Analysis Research for Higher Education Strategic Planning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze strategic planning documents of higher education institutions to identify core elements (goals, strategies, implementation programs)

Within one week, learners analyze internal/external environmental data (e.g., budget reports, regional industry trends) of a given vocational training institution using the SWOT framework. They submit reports deriving ≥1 specific evaluation item per category (2 strengths, 1 weakness, 1 opportunity)
Learners can explain the strategic planning process using microlearning content in constrained environments (smartphones)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
